siteMetadata.title: BY-COVID
siteMetadata.description: The BY-COVID project aims to make SARS-CoV-2 and other infectious disease data easier to find and access for life scientists and researchers across Europe.
siteMetadata.author: Katharina Lauer, Xenia Sitja Perez, Erin Haskell, Martin Cook (ELIXIR Hub)

frontmatter.title: BY-COVID featured in the press at GenomeWeb
frontmatter.description: The BY-COVID project has been featured in an article on GenomeWeb, an online news organisation that promotes the scientific and economic ecosystem spurred by the advent of high-throughput genome sequencing.

frontmatter.title: VEO submits the eighth report on mutations and variation in publicly shared SARS-CoV-2 data
frontmatter.description: The Versatile Emerging infectious disease Observatory (VEO) has published its eighth report on mutations and variation in publicly shared SARS-CoV-2 raw sequencing data.

frontmatter.title: Galaxy Europe provide a simple and free method for analysing SARS-CoV-2 Omicron variant data
frontmatter.description: Computer scientists and developers from BY-COVID involved in Galaxy Europe have published new data and analysis methods on the new SARS-CoV-2 variant of concern, Omicron.

frontmatter.title: VEO submits the ninth report on mutations and variation in publicly shared SARS-CoV-2 data
frontmatter.description: The Versatile Emerging infectious disease Observatory (VEO) has published its ninth report on SARS-Cov-2 sequence data submitted to the European COVID-19 Data Portal.

frontmatter.title: VEO submits the tenth report on mutations and variation in publicly shared SARS-CoV-2 raw sequencing data.
frontmatter.description: In its tenth report to the European Commission, VEO Consortium members summarize mobilisation and analysis of SARS-CoV-2 sequence data submitted to the European COVID-19 Data Platform in the context of the VEO project, which aims to develop tools and data analytics for pandemic and outbreak preparedness.

frontmatter.title: BY-COVID - a new EU project for pandemic preparedness
frontmatter.description: The BeYond-COVID (BY-COVID) project launches today. It aims to make SARS-CoV-2 and other infectious disease data easier to find and share.

frontmatter.title: Accessibilty
frontmatter.description: Our guide to accessibility on the BY-COVID project website.

frontmatter.title: BY-COVID
frontmatter.description: The BeYond-COVID (BY-COVID) project aims to provide open data on SARS-CoV-2 and other infectious diseases across scientific, medical and public health domains.

frontmatter.title: Outreach and media
frontmatter.description: The outreach activities and media resources (logos and other visuals) of the BY-COVID project.

frontmatter.title: Privacy
frontmatter.description: The privacy statement of the BY-COVID project website, including what data we collect and how you can control that.

frontmatter.title: Outcomes
frontmatter.description: Publications, deliveries and milestones and other outputs of the BY-COVID project.

frontmatter.title: About
frontmatter.description: About the BY-COVID project, which aims to make data on COVID-19 (SARS-CoV-2) and other infectious diseases open and accessible to everyone.
